bool CompleteConfig::isValid (  )  [inline]

Returns validity of the current configuration. Assumes that validate() has been called since last configuratino change.

void CompleteConfig::validate ( string &  error  )  [inline]

Update the b_valid boolean to reflect whether the configuration is valid. @ param error Updated to reflect the status of any errors on a failed validation.
